Smith Gentlemen: The undersigned is a shareholder of Gulf South Medical Supply, Inc. ("GSMS"), a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the State of Delaware, and will become a shareholder of Physician Sales & Service, Inc. ("PSS"), a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the State of Florida, pursuant to the transactions described in the Agreement and Plan of Merger, dated as of December 14, 1997 (the "Agreement"), by and among PSS, PSS Merger Corp.
